name: Race'N Blast
description:
RACE TO WIN, BLAST TO GAIN
In Race’n Blast, you’ll dash through the busy streets in New York and fly over the cable cars in San Francisco. You’ll find a world of challenge, excitement and arcade fun on your exotic racing car, with two heavily loaded machine guns sitting right on top!

BLAST & SMASH YOUR WAY TO THE TOP
• Size matters! Unlock your machine gun to a Plasma Zapper, or all the way to a Laser Blaster. Melt the street gangs who dares to shoot at you.
• Smash and crash other suckers that get in your way, from New York to San Francisco, from Tokyo to Paris!
